name: Dig or Die
description: Crash land on a hostile planet where you'll have to build the strongest defenses if you wish to live to escape from it. But be warned... this planet is merciless. Build strong, and smart; else physics may flood or destroy your only hopes of survival.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP, Vista, 7, 8, 10 Processor: Intel 2.4 GHz, Amd FX-8350 or better Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: 256MB video memory, capable of shader model 2.0 DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 500 MB available space Additional Notes: Mouse, Keyboard.  Edit on 2016/03/25: caution, the game doesn't work on some Win XP 32bits hardware (not everyone), and i'm not sure if i'll be able to fix it. So you can ask a refund if that's the case for you
